response.INVALID_FORMATTING: Your command had invalid formatting! use **!quotes help** to see correct usage.
response.AUTHOR_ARG_REQUIRED: You must specify an author to list quotes from. Use **!quotes help** to see correct usage.
response.DUPLICATE_QUOTE: An identical quote by this person has already been saved!
response.GENERIC_ERROR: There was a problem saving your quote. Please try again later
response.GENERIC_RETRIEVAL_ERROR: There was a problem retrieving the specified quotes. Please contact the developer.
response.INCORRECT_AUTHOR_SYNTAX: Invalid command. The author's name can only contain letters and spaces.
